name: Gengar
author: Akira Komayama
flavor_text: Possesses potential victims’ shadows in an effort to steal away the victims’ lives. If your shadow begins to laugh, you must take hold of a protective charm posthaste!

abilities.name: Netherworld Gate
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in your discard pile, you may put it onto your Bench. If you do, put 3 damage counters on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Screaming Circle
attacks.effect: Put 2 damage counters on your opponent’s Active Pokémon for each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon.
